programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Wetlands Ep2
programme.desc: As water flows from Australia's highlands into the seas, an assortment of environmental niches set the stage for multifaceted interactions between predators and their prey.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 - Oceans Ep4
programme.desc: Australia is home to the worlds most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, its a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can envenomate, poison or maim.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Human Influenced Ep2
programme.desc: In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet weve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Laos: the Mountain Wilds Ep2
programme.desc: Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. Its topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laoss tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Relentless Sun Ep7
programme.desc: A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures. While some animals succumb to dehydration, the team must concentrate its efforts on a particularly vulnerable - and dangerous - water buffalo.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Interior Ep3
programme.desc: Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Bush Camps Ep8
programme.desc: Eco-tourism isn't just a background player in the operation of Ol Pejeta, it's the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ultra-luxurious accommodation, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature during their stay and they even assist in research and tracking park wildlife.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale Ep1
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkeys paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Thailand: Coming of Age Ep3
programme.desc: The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.desc: Ocean Views And Maui Mermaids In Kihei - A couple have fantasised about living in Maui since their honeymoon. They hope to find a home with an ocean view, a pool and room for guests.

programme.title: American Monster S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Wrong Man - The Dowlings like to capture their kids' milestones on tape. But when Kevin is accused of a murder in a nearby town, his fate hangs on that same home camera.

programme.title: The Dead Files S15 Ep7
programme.desc: Chaos In The Canyon - Lisa and her husband poured their blood, sweat and tears into their California home.

programme.title: Hotel Impossible: Top Ten Amazing Transformations Ep
programme.desc: Hotel Impossible: Top Ten Amazing Transformations - Anthony and designer Blanche recall the show's top ten transformations.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters S6 Ep2
programme.desc: South Sea Style - Drew heads for elegant country pile so overstuffed with great antiques that the owners have to sell some items just to make house space.

programme.title: The Holzer Files S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Haunting Of Lambert Castle - The team resurrects Hans Holzer's investigation of a mysterious castle in Paterson, NJ.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Lake Fear - Russell tracks an unknown creature to a mysterious lake hidden in the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Fear S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Yorktown Memorial Hospital - The team investigates a Texas hospital with a gruesome history, including a brutal double homicide.

programme.title: Off The Grid S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Sarawak - Part 1 - Being a celebrity means you are always exposed to the public. What if you can free yourself from all the cameras, disconnect yourself and just disappear?

programme.title: Contact S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Real Men In Black - Doubting official reports, Paul and Kawa investigate a UFO crash site in Argentina, and eyewitness accounts of mysterious men in black.

programme.title: Hotel Impossible S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Masters Of My Domain - Anthony is in Aiken, South Carolina, 30 minutes from Augusta National Golf Club, home of The Masters, to help a struggling 34-room family hotel.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Return To Diomede - Jim Tweto and his family-run airline Era Alaska battle the arctic elements to transport supplies and passengers to some of the most inaccessible areas on the planet.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Booze Is - Jack gets to live one of his greatest childhood dreams at Fenway Park,drinks a bizarre beaver-spiked liquor and learns what it takes to be a lobsterman.

programme.title: Most Terrifying Places S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Horror Behind The Walls - A massive 19th-century prison hides a terrifying secret within its walls, a sinister sealed door haunts a British museum and restless residents from centuries past

programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2013 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: MTV Top 20
programme.desc: Let's take a look at some of the biggest hits that are circulating the globe right now in this top 20 countdown!

programme.title: MTV Live Vault!
programme.desc: We've headed down to the MTV Live Vault and discovered some amazing stuff. It's so good, we had to share it with you. This is the MTV Live Vault!

programme.title: Global Beats!

programme.title: Rock.Alt.Indie
programme.desc: Plug in your guitar and amp up the volume because we're bringing you the best of the best from the Rock, Alternative and Indie scene!

programme.title: MTV World Stage: VMA 2021...
programme.desc: ... Highlights Show 1. The MTV VMAs returned for one of the biggest nights in music, with performances from Justin Bieber, Doja Cat, Olivia Rodrigo, Shawn Mendes and many more.

programme.title: MTV World Stage: VMA 2021...
programme.desc: ... Highlights Show 2. Featuring more highlights from the VMAs in New York, including performances from Foo Fighters, Ed Sheeran and Kacey Musgraves.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2012
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2012 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep11
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Sam / Toy Driver - Its Tag and Scoochs first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tags old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Toy Wash - Fuse is heartbroken when his new special toy wash is broken. Right before Revs could have a wash in it too! Noddy decides to investigate and help the little robot find out who has broken it. Using all his investigating skills and collecting evidence with the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that it's his own best beloved car, Revs, who broke the toy wash! Poor Revs thought that if he went through the toy wash he'd miss his special time with Noddy and Bumpy. Noddy finds a way for Revs to enjoy the toy wash AND still has his special playtime with his best friends. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep15
programme.desc: Lair - D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew who's boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip's Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep29
programme.desc: Lucky and the Big Goodbye - While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep30
programme.desc: 127 Owwws / 28 Fleas Later - Eep and Thunk become obsessed with a new trend known as quicktogramming/Grug accidentally causes the first outbreak of a super bug

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep31
programme.desc: To Squawk With Love / Lerk Was The Night - Eep & Thunk cheer up Squawk to avoid the first final exam/Eep and Lerk venture to the Garden of Eaten after the Broods spike the Watering Hole

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep21
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 1 - As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep22
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 2 - The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep7
programme.desc: Team Building - Ceo, Akila, and Brian must demonstrate they make a great team so Khepra doesnt split them up.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep29
programme.desc: The Hunted - Lotor seizes the opportunity and lures the Paladins to Thayserix, a mysterious gas planet

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep30
programme.desc: Hole In The Sky - After an emergency beacon draws Team Voltron to an ancient derelict Altean ship stuck in a temporal rift, the team is transported to an alternate universe.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep30
programme.desc: Climate Control / Ziryab - When Hobson gives Peabody and Sherman a weather-controlling device, they can't agree on a temperature and cause a massive storm flood in the Penthouse

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep31
programme.desc: Brain Switch / Koikawa Harumachi - When Peabody uses a brain-switching machine to let Sherman find out what it's like to be grown up, Sherman likes it so much he refuses to switch back

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep3
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter Three - When Bullwinkle remembers he forgot the secret ingredient to his stinky pie recipe, he and Rocky travel to Norway and enlist the help of his beloved Grandwinkle, not knowing that they are being followed!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep4
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter Four - Director Peachfuzz recruits Rocky and Bullwinkle to help her infiltrate Fearless Leaders hideout, and Boris and Natasha are replaced by a robot henchman

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep29
programme.desc: The Fluffberg Method / Singing Tele-Grammers - When Dr. Fluffberg is outed as not being a real doctor, Archibald must help him through medical school where students are put through the trials of a simulated hospital. / Archibald dons the mantle of a singing telegrammer but runs into trouble when he loses the official Grammer songbook.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep30
programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep12
programme.desc: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard - When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep12
programme.desc: The Liar and The Thief - The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhminis hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years shes been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep12
programme.desc: Venice the Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions North, South, East and West and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep12
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Egg Race - It's the day of the Nutwood Egg and Spoon race but Raggety has magically turned Ping Pong into a giant egg. How can Ruprt and the friends have their race now?

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep12
programme.desc: Driven to Distraction / To Bee or Not To Bee - When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Dazzle Dragon - Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep16
programme.desc: Bahama Drama - When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep16
programme.desc: Buster Move / Gills! - Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit.// Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep16
programme.desc: Battering Ram - When parts go missing from the garage, Ace and Skya solve the mystery when they discover D-Structs has a new claw-tail which they put to the test.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep16
programme.desc: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pig's Tail - Tip's new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky and the Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, its up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare hell never forget!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep32
programme.desc: The Flawed Couple/ Go-Sip Girl - To learn about jobs, Grug assigns kids to the first shadowing/Ugga mistakenly creates the first gossip to impress the nitting club

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep33
programme.desc: Munk History / Happy Howl Day - Grug tries to solve the mystery of where Munk's family is /Eep refuses to join in when Ahhh! Valley celebrates their first holiday, Howl Day

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep12
programme.desc: The Liar and The Thief - The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhminis hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years shes been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep13
programme.desc: One Last Job - The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep42

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep8

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! // Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Dragon / Pups Save the Critters - Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage - When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge - Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Going Off With A Bang / Talent For Trouble - Steel and the Deer Squad want to organise a surprise party for Professor Scratch's birthday but the twins almost ruin the party. // To win the big talent show, Stu and Safia get Professor Scratch to programme Dinobot to obey their every command.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail - Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather // Paddington befriends a speedy snail, who is so fast she has a heroic future ahead, but why does she look so sad?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival - Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage - When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day.

programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Manny Tsigas.

programme.title: The Business Ep47
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The World Ep63
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Now at the new earlier time of 9pm AEST, Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news from correspondents and guests.

programme.title: Australian Story - On The Brink - Bon Scott Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australian Story revisits the remarkable life of the late Bon Scott to celebrate the 50th anniversary of him joining AC/DC.

programme.title: Planet America Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The 2024 Presidential race is on. Former President Donald Trump is the Presumptive Republican nominee, running in his third election. Current President Joe Biden is standing for re-election as both seek a second term.

programme.title: Adam And Poh's Malaysia In Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Adam meets farmer, Graham Gilmore in the New South Wales Central West and then Adam and Poh are back in Tasmania at the famed Agrarian Kitchen. Adam cooks Rendang Terlagi-lagi, while Poh makes her famous Beef Curry Puffs.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Chef Khanh Ong travels to Mallacoota, Victoria to explore the seafood delicacies that the area has to offer but decides to make a few pitstops along the way. He learns how to make blue cheese.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep78
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.title: UFC Connected EpUFCConnected510FighterFocusDaveyGrantTake5IanGarryUltimateAccessKamaruUsman
programme.desc: We track the evolution of British fan favorite 'Dangerous' Davey Grant. Irish prospect Ian Machado Garry shares his top Conor McGregor moments. And a UFC champion is honored by a college wrestling hall of fame.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC295ProchazkavsPereira
programme.desc: UFC celebrates its 30th Anniversary at Madison Square Garden with an epic championship doubleheader. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep2
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts EpUFCUltimateKnockouts904HispanicHeritageMonthPt2

programme.title: UFC 300: Pereira vs. Hill
programme.desc: Prelims - Over 30 years in the making, UFC 300 is finally here on April 14, complete with three title fights and a card stacked from top to bottom with mixed martial arts biggest stars. In the main event at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, Jamahal Hill attempts to regain the title he never lost in the Octagon when he meets light heavyweight king Alex Pereira. Plus, an all-China showdown pits strawweight champion Zhang Weili against top contenderYan Xiaonan, and the BMF title is on the line when Justin Gaethje faces off with Max Holloway

programme.title: PSA 2023/24: Black Ball Squash Open 2024 Ep2

programme.title: 2024 SINGAPORE T100 Ep1
programme.desc: Women's Race - 40 of the worlds best female and male professional triathletes battle over 8 breakneck 100km races in iconic locations around the globe in a bid to be crowned the first-ever T100 World Champions.
